mil3.2.3:1.2: “bhante nagasena, yassa nanam uppannam, tassa panna uppanna”ti?
mil3.2.3:1.3: “Ama, maharaja, yassa nanam uppannam, tassa panna uppanna”ti.
mil3.2.3:1.6: “Yassa pana, bhante, tanneva nanam sayeva panna uppanna, kim sammuyheyya so, udahu na sammuyheyya”ti?
mil3.2.3:1.9: “Annatapubbesu va, maharaja, sippatthanesu, agatapubbaya va disaya, assutapubbaya va namapannattiya sammuyheyya”ti.
mil3.2.3:1.11: “Yam kho pana, maharaja, taya pannaya katam ‘aniccan’ti va ‘dukkhan’ti va ‘anatta’ti va, tahim na sammuyheyya”ti.
mil3.2.3:1.13: “Moho kho, maharaja, nane uppannamatte tattheva nirujjhati”ti.
mil3.2.3:2.2: “Yatha, maharaja, kocideva puriso andhakaragehe padipam aropeyya, tato andhakaro nirujjheyya, aloko patubhaveyya;
mil3.2.3:2.3: evameva kho, maharaja, nane uppannamatte moho tattheva nirujjhati”ti.
mil3.2.3:3.2: “Pannapi kho, maharaja, sakiccayam katva tattheva nirujjhati, yam pana taya pannaya katam ‘aniccan’ti va ‘dukkhan’ti va ‘anatta’ti va, tam na nirujjhati”ti.
mil3.2.3:4.1: “Bhante nagasena, yam panetam brusi ‘panna sakiccayam katva tattheva nirujjhati, yam pana taya pannaya katam “aniccan”ti va “dukkhan”ti va “anatta”ti va, tam na nirujjhati’ti, tassa opammam karohi”ti.
mil3.2.3:4.2: “Yatha, maharaja, yo koci puriso rattim lekham pesetukamo lekhakam pakkosapetva padipam aropetva lekham likhapeyya, likhite pana lekhe padipam vijjhapeyya, vijjhapitepi padipe lekham na vinasseyya.
mil3.2.3:4.3: Evameva kho, maharaja, panna sakiccayam katva tattheva nirujjhati, yam pana taya pannaya katam ‘aniccan’ti va ‘dukkhan’ti va ‘anatta’ti va, tam na nirujjhati”ti.
mil3.2.3:5.2: “Yatha, maharaja, puratthimesu janapadesu manussa anugharam panca panca udakaghatakani thapenti alimpanam vijjhapetum, ghare paditte tani panca udakaghatakani gharassupari khipanti, tato aggi vijjhayati, kim nu kho, maharaja, tesam manussanam evam hoti ‘puna tehi ghatehi ghatakiccam karissama’”ti?
mil3.2.3:5.3: “Na hi, bhante, alam tehi ghatehi, kim tehi ghatehi”ti?
mil3.2.3:5.4: “Yatha, maharaja, panca udakaghatakani, evam pancindriyani datthabbani saddhindriyam viriyindriyam satindriyam samadhindriyam pannindriyam.
mil3.2.3:5.5: Yatha te manussa, evam yogavacaro datthabbo.
mil3.2.3:5.7: Yatha pancahi udakaghatakehi aggi vijjhapiyati, evam pancindriyehi kilesa vijjhapiyanti, vijjhapitapi kilesa na puna sambhavanti.
mil3.2.3:5.8: Evameva kho, maharaja, panna sakiccayam katva tattheva nirujjhati, yam pana taya pannaya katam ‘aniccan’ti va ‘dukkhan’ti va ‘anatta’ti va, tam na nirujjhati”ti.
mil3.2.3:6.2: “Yatha, maharaja, vejjo pancamulabhesajjani gahetva gilanakam upasankamitva tani pancamulabhesajjani pisitva gilanakam payeyya, tehi ca dosa niddhameyyum, kim nu kho, maharaja, tassa vejjassa evam hoti ‘puna tehi pancamulabhesajjehi bhesajjakiccam karissami’”ti?
mil3.2.3:6.3: “Na hi, bhante, alam tehi pancamulabhesajjehi, kim tehi pancamulabhesajjehi”ti?
mil3.2.3:6.4: “Yatha, maharaja, pancamulabhesajjani, evam pancindriyani datthabbani saddhindriyam viriyindriyam satindriyam samadhindriyam pannindriyam, yatha vejjo, evam yogavacaro datthabbo.
mil3.2.3:6.6: Yatha byadhito puriso, evam puthujjano datthabbo.
mil3.2.3:6.7: Yatha pancamulabhesajjehi gilanassa dosa niddhanta, dose niddhante gilano arogo hoti, evam pancindriyehi kilesa niddhamiyanti, niddhamita ca kilesa na puna sambhavanti.
mil3.2.3:6.8: Evameva kho, maharaja, panna sakiccayam katva tattheva nirujjhati, yam pana taya pannaya katam ‘aniccan’ti va ‘dukkhan’ti va ‘anatta’ti va, tam na nirujjhati”ti.
mil3.2.3:7.2: “Yatha, maharaja, sangamavacaro yodho panca kandani gahetva sangamam otareyya parasenam vijetum, so sangamagato tani panca kandani khipeyya, tehi ca parasena bhijjeyya, kim nu kho, maharaja, tassa sangamavacarassa yodhassa evam hoti ‘puna tehi kandehi kandakiccam karissami’”ti?
mil3.2.3:7.3: “Na hi, bhante, alam tehi kandehi, kim tehi kandehi”ti?
mil3.2.3:7.4: “Yatha, maharaja, panca kandani, evam pancindriyani datthabbani saddhindriyam viriyindriyam satindriyam samadhindriyam pannindriyam.
mil3.2.3:7.5: Yatha, maharaja, sangamavacaro yodho, evam yogavacaro datthabbo.
mil3.2.3:7.7: Yatha pancahi kandehi parasena bhijjati, evam pancindriyehi kilesa bhijjanti, bhagga ca kilesa na puna sambhavanti.
mil3.2.3:7.8: Evameva kho, maharaja, panna sakiccayam katva tattheva nirujjhati, yam pana taya pannaya katam ‘aniccan’ti va ‘dukkhan’ti va ‘anatta’ti va, tam na nirujjhati”ti.
